code: export var COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER="COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER";export var COMPANY_INFO_GENERAL_PAGE_MESSAGE_HANDLER="COMPANY_INFO_GENERAL_PAGE_MESSAGE_HANDLER";export var COMPANY_INFO_ABOUT_PAGE_MESSAGE_HANDLER="COMPANY_INFO_ABOUT_PAGE_MESSAGE_HANDLER";export var textFieldResetChangeHandler=function textFieldResetChangeHandler(name,value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value,key:name});};};export var saveCompanyGeneralInfo=function saveCompanyGeneralInfo(value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_GENERAL_PAGE_MESSAGE_HANDLER,payload:value});};};export var saveCompanyAboutInfo=function saveCompanyAboutInfo(value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_ABOUT_PAGE_MESSAGE_HANDLER,payload:value});};};export var saveCompanyGeneralInfoData=function saveCompanyGeneralInfoData(value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.name?value.name:"",key:'NameField'});dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.contact?value.contact:"",key:'NumberField'});dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.countryName?value.countryName:"",key:'CountryField'});dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.stateName?value.stateName:"",key:'ProvinceField'});dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.cityName?value.cityName:"",key:'CityField'});};};export var saveCompanyAboutInfoData=function saveCompanyAboutInfoData(value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.summary?value.summary:"",key:'AboutCompanyField'});dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.url?value.url:"",key:'websiteURLField'});dispatch({type:COMPANY_INFO_PAGE_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value.companyEmail?value.companyEmail:"",key:'companyEmailField'});};};
